B. TECH COURSE :

Eligibility: A candidate should be a pass in 10+2 examination from recognized board/university with physics and mathematics as compulsory subjects along with one of the following subjects: 
(a) Chemistry 
(b) Bio-Technology 
(c) Computer Science 
(d) Biology 
Have passed diploma course in engineering / technology of three years duration or more from State Board Technical Education, Haryana or its equivalent Diploma examination.
For detail admission procedures, fee, no of intake please visit 
www.tehadmissions.gov.in and 
www.hstes.org.in

Financial assistance for Innovative projects/ideas/proof of concepts/prototype./model development is available under TEQIP Project for project duration subject to availability of funds. 

 B. TECH. LEET COURSE :

Eligibility: Pass in 3 year or more diploma course in Engineering/ Technology with at least 45% marks in aggregate of all semesters. Diploma of 2 year after 10+2 with at least 45% marks in aggregate of all semesters. Pass in 3 year or more B. Sc. Degree with at least 45% marks in aggregate with Maths as a subject.
 1. Bio- Technology Engg. (BT)-60 + KM
 2. Computer Sc. Engg. (CSE)-120 + KM
 3. Electronics and Communication Egg. (ECE)-120+KM
 4. Mechanical Egg. (ME)-60+KM
 M. TECH. COURSE :
The admission to M.Tech. Programms are done through 'GATE SCORE' as well as through “Institute Level Entrance Test”, conducted annually. Candidate is advised to visit the website for updates .
 The two year full time M.Tech programmes are available in following specializations.
 1. Bio- Technology-18
 2. Computer Engg.-18
 3. Electrical Engg.-18
 4. Electronics and Communication Egg.-18
 5. Material Sci. and Tech.-18
 6. Mechanical Engg. (Industrial and Production Engg.)-18
 7. Mechanical Engg. (Thermal Engg.)-18
 8. Software Engg.-18
 
PG Scholarship/Assistantship of Rs12000.00 (amendable time to time by AICTE) per month is available to all GATE qualified admitted students in all the above disciplines. 
Ph.D. COURSE :
Admissions to Ph.D. programmes are available in following departments.
 1. Electronics and Communication Engineering
 2. Computer Science and Engineering
 3. BioTechnology
 4. Mechanical Engineering
 5. Applied Science
 For detail admission procedures, eligibility, fee, number of intake please visit www.uietkuk.org, regularly.
